title: PAYDAY The Heist
description: PAYDAY The Heist is an action filled first person shooter that lets players take on the role of a hardened career criminal executing intense, dynamic heists in constant pursuit of the next “big score”. Load out with an array of weaponry and equipment. Navigate six high-stake heists with three other live or A.I. Co-Op partners in crime . Time for a PAYDAY – Cash in Before you Cash Out Backpack Battles
